profile:
At NuGround, our goal is to provide freedom and peace of mind to homeowners by offering them reliable, high-quality relocation services and outstanding customer care. Those services include local moving & junk removal.

As service providers, we value hard work, customer service, and professionalism. Our team is highly capable and well-trained. All individuals wear uniforms and our vehicles our properly branded. We care deeply about our community and we are proudly Canadian.


Whether you need a few furniture items moved within your home or you're relocating to a different address altogether... we can help! We can move you from your apartment, condo, house, self-storage unit... You name it. We've done it! We are the ideal solution if you need local moving services for your home in Bolton, Caledon, Vaughan, Brampton, Orangeville, Kleinburg or a nearby township.
  
Over time, your home may start to feel cluttered with underused household items. This may be a sign that it's time to reorganize and get NuGround to remove some household junk from your property.

Whether you need a few items removed from your garage or basement or you're doing a complete downsizing... we can help! Our services are ideal for decluttering, spring cleanings, downsizing, home renovations and more. Not to mention, we donate and recycle as many items as we can! We are the ideal solution if you need junk removal services for your home in Bolton, Caledon, Vaughan, Brampton, Orangeville, Kleinburg or a nearby township.
services:
Local Moves
Senior Moves
Loading/Unloading Containers
Home-Staging Projects
Apartment Moves
Estate Clear-outs
Home Renovation Clean-ups
Spring Cleaning
De-Cluttering
Furniture Donations
specialities:
OUR VALUES

Hard Work
We're not afraid to get our hands dirty. In fact, it's inevitable in our line of work.No matter what, we do everything we can to make sure that the job gets done right and on time. 

Customer Service
The most important thing to us is customer satisfaction.Everything we do, we do with the customer's best interest in mind. Without happy clients, NuGround wouldn't exists. It's that simple.

Professionalism
Our team is well educated and well trained. When we show up at your door, you can count on us being friendly, polite, and helpful. Our crews wear uniforms and our trucks our properly branded.

Community
We love our town, our community and we are proudly Canadian. Our focus is to provide quality jobs and careers to Canadian while at the same time doing what we can to help our environment.

profile:
Essential Disposal has been serving GTA residents with disposal bin rental services for many years. Our dumpster rentals are delivered and picked up for you, so you don’t have to worry about any of the logistics surrounding disposal. 
 
Whether you’re in need of accumulated household junk removal or construction roll-off disposal our large garbage bins come in a variety of sizes, and you’ll experience only the finest customer service at drop off and pick up times. 
 
Visit us at www.essentialdisposal.com for more info!
